Home Football The 16-year-old German prodigy took part in the Barcelona first team training session in preparation for his visit to Villarreal

The 16-year-old German prodigy took part in the Barcelona first team training session in preparation for his visit to Villarreal

Football Emily · 24/08/2023 · Barcelona

﻿Giving young talents at FC Barcelona an opportunity to develop inside the dynamics of the first squad is an experience unlike any other. This period of learning from some of the best footballers in the world while honing their own talents by competing with and against such superstars has been experienced by many of the game's greatest players.

Stars from La Masia like Gavi, Alejandro Balde, Ansu Fati, Fermin Lopez, and other young players like Pedri, Ez Abde, and even Ronald Araujo at one point were all given the chance to grow into who they are now thanks to the dynamics of the FC Barcelona first squad.
